title: Gaze Maze
shortDescription: A 3D puzzle game with an over-the-shoulder camera view.
description: A 2D multiplayer shooter game where up to 8 players compete against each other in a free for all or team battles. There is a vast number of characters to choose from and each character has a unique ability. It also includes some NFT characters provided to the game by Ethlas's ReadyNFT.
